data.text: @WADeptHealth Getting long haul Covid is not my fault. No one gives a damn and we suffer silently and no one gives a damn.

@WADeptHealth 😂 the way those hundreds of thousands of cases a day just last month, I thought we all had it, you know, those cold symptoms? I tell you what, there are going to be a special need for therapists you keep this up 😂

@WADeptHealth But if you don’t get a vaccination they can fire you, how is that helping someone with their mental health crisis?!? It’s unconstitutional, segregational and you are treating people like second hand citizens! Everyone is the same. Get over it!!!
@WADeptHealth Aww, are all those double- and triple-vaxxed fools who STILL caught convid experiencing depression and anxiety?  Poor babies.

@WADeptHealth Hahaha. You filthy bastards spent two years othering everyone who dared even ask for source material for your claims and now you are trying to be nice? Eat a bag of dicks and find a more respectable job. Like crackhead, or panhandler.

@ScepticTruth @WADeptHealth True but let's be honest... DOH didn't influence Inslee. They were all in on it, all benefited from it, and all lied to the people of WA.  Throw UW into the mix and you have the WA trifecta of deceit.  F'em all.
@WADeptHealth Also - not something you should live in fear with

@WADeptHealth But aren't we basically forcing the last one by lifting mask mandates because things "seem ok right now" rather than keeping them in place until things truly settle?

Brushing it under the rug so a few people can feel "free" at cost of nany others doesn't seem a wise or safe idea
@WADeptHealth More ashamed how you democrats handled it🤔
